title: IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology of Ropar (IIT Ropar) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025 . Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can atte...
